meanings.definition: A covering for the foot, typically made of leather or other material, with a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.
meanings.sent1: I put on my shoes before going outside.
meanings.sent2: Her shoes were neatly lined up by the door.
meanings.sent3: The shoes danced off the shelf when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His shoes carried him through the journey of life.
meanings.sent5: The red shoes stood out in the sea of black footwear.

meanings.sent1: The blacksmith crafted a new set of shoes for the horse.
meanings.sent2: The shoes were nailed to the horse's hooves for protection.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to wear the horse's shoes as a hat.
meanings.sent4: The shoes of the horse echoed on the cobblestone street.
meanings.sent5: The shiny shoes of the horse brought luck to the rider.
